Feline2::
She looked up at HotRod. She could tell by his scent that he had 
changed.  "Your one of those maximals now.  You lied and told me that 
you loved me." She turned her head away from him. "You just want me 
to transform so that you can take me back so they can kill me. Well, 
I'm sorry, but I don't want to die. And I'm not going back there to 
get scrapped. If you want me dead, you'll have to fight me yourself." 
She was already feeling the effects of mech fluid loss. And knew she 
wouldn't win in a fight. But for some reason, one she couldn't quite 
understand, she was feeling her spark break.


Diamond::
She smiled at Drillbit. "Drillbit. I am Diamond. I had barely escaped 
the cluthes of the maximals back on Cybertron. I would like to join 
you and your group. If that is possable."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He transformed back to bot mode, and made his way through the brush.
> It was hard, but he finally found the tree Feline was in. He 
climbed it,
> careful not to break it under his weight. He found himself next to 
her.
> "Please transform, so we can talk face to face." 
> He really didn't want to have an important conversation to a beast 
mode.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He saw Diamond.
> "Hello. Yes, I'm a Predicon. The name is DrillBit. We recieved your
> message, and I was sent to escort you to base."
